content: knitting pattern na-bi scarf difficulty easy designed by basma yassin 2023 basma yassin all right reserved the pattern is for personal use only reselling and commercial use are not allowed 1 gauge/with 5mm needle 29 sts and 26 row = 10× 10 cm \ 4× 4 in pattern stitch cables after blocking size one size about 23cm × 230cm needles 5mm for the main part 4 5mm for ribbing 4mm for bobble use circular needles ranging from 60 to 80 cm other materials stitch markers if you need it tapestry needle and cable needle yarn or aliza lanagold classic yarn 240 meters 51% acrylic 49% wool / 100 gr 4 balls aliza angora gold in two threads 550 meters 80% acrylic 20% wool / 100 gr 3 5 balls stitch explanation  5/5 lc 5 over 5 left cross slip 5 sts to cable needle and hold in front k5 then k5 from cable needle note the main cable pattern has a chart on page5 for your reference  k2 p2 rib row 1 rs k2 *p2 k2* row 2 ws p2 *k2 p2* 2 scarf with 4 5mm needle long tail method co 70 sts set up row p2 * k2 p2 * repeat to the last stitch row 1 rs k2 * p2 k2 * repeat row 2 ws p2 * k2 p2 * repeat work in rib until piece measures about 7cm 2 8 in end with rs row 16 row next row ws p2 * k2 p2 * repeat to the last 4 sts k2tog p2 69 sts decrease 1st with 5mm needle work row 1 & 3 rs k2 *p2 k10 p2 k1tbl p1 k1tbl* repeat 2 more times p2 k10 p2 k2 row 2 & 4 ws p2 *k2 p10 k2 p1tbl k1 p1tbl* repeat 2 more times k2 p10 k2 p2 row 5 rs k2 *p2 5/5 lc p2 k1tbl p1 k1tbl* 2 more times p2 5/5 lc p2 k2 row 6 & 8 &10 ws same row 2 row 7 & 9 rs same row 1 repeat row 1 10 until piece measures about 223cm from beg or repeat until 7 cm less than your desired length end with row 9 rs change to smaller needles 4 5mm work rib ws p2 * k2 p2 * repeat to 3 last sts k1 m1l p2 70 stitches increase 1st row 1 rs k2 * p2 k2 * repeat row 2 ws p2 * k2 p2 * repeat work in rib until piece measures about 7cm 2 8 in end with ws row 16 row note 16 row including set-up row bobble all stitches with backward loop traditional chain method with 4mm needle for a neater look finishing weave the ends and wet block to measurements 3 abbreviations co cast on rs right side ws wrong side lc left cable k knit p purl k2tog knit two stitches on left needle together 1 stitch decreased k1tbl knit one stitch from the back loop p1tbl
